description.intro: My name is Lucas. I started in the programming world in 2019. Previously, I was a systems technician, and I am currently a recent graduate in web application development.
description.training: During my education, I focused my learning on frontend technologies, using JavaScript/TypeScript as programming languages along with React and Next.js, although I also have knowledge in backend using Java, JSF, Spring.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Specialized profile in frontend development, with knowledge in backend and databases.
